title: Need lol in zip folder
body: Can someone upload they lol in zip folder my internet is not good at all.

replies.body: Doing that is risky as you might not know anything malicious hiding inside.  League can only be downloaded through the patching server, so you might want to try a library or location that offers some solid net access.  Otherwise, you can also try transferring the entire League folder into a USB and into your PC, though there's a risk of game file corruption.
